EXPLANATION.GLM_dir: path to the folder were the glm analysis will be made
EXPLANATION.GLM_measurements: cortical parameters that will be used for FreeSurfer GLM analysis: thickness,area,volume,curv
EXPLANATION.GLM_thresholds: threshold levels for smoothing in mm, used for FreeSurfer GLM analysis: 5,10,15,20,25
EXPLANATION.GLM_MCz_cache: level of FreeSurfer GLM MCZ simulation threshold 13 equals to p:0.05
EXPLANATION.freesurfer_version: default is 7 (for 7.1.1) but pipeline should also work with versions 6 and 5
